OnKeyDownAsync() OnKeyDownAsyncLuthetus.Extensions.DotNet.CompilerServices.Models.CompilerServiceExplorerTreeViewKeyboardEventHandler Luthetus.Extensions.DotNet.CompilerServices.Models.CompilerServiceExplorerTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerOnKeyDownAsync
override Task Luthetus.Extensions.DotNet.CompilerServices.Models.CompilerServiceExplorerTreeViewKeyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync (TreeViewCommandArgs commandArgs)[virtual]
Invoked, and awaited, as part of the async UI event handler for 'onkeydownwithpreventscroll' events..
The synchronous version: 'OnKeyDown(TreeViewCommandArgs)' will be invoked immediately from within this method, to allow the synchronous code to block the UI purposefully.
Any overrides of this method are intended to have 'base.MethodBeingOverridden()' prior to their code.
Reimplemented from Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.TreeViewKeyboardEventHandler.
